eant." Rodimus said, his words

but he still felt an

ight

Rodimus stepped =
over to the being formerly known as Nightlight, he
looked down at her as sh=
e she lay there, looking strangely helpless as
she fought to remember who s=
he was, but  couldn't. There was something
in her struggle that moved him. =
He felt a kinship in it.

"My name is Rodimus." Rodimus said, trying to kee=
p his tones soothing.
He reached out to touch her hand, but stopped just sh=
ort, and instead
laid it on the edge of the cart. "Don't worry about names =
yet, you
will have one in time."

He glanced over at Perceptor and then bac=
k at her, "How do you feel?"
